channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 影评米莉-鲍比-布朗（Millie Bobby Brown）在 Netflix 出品的《女仆》（Damsel）中饰演一位在新婚之夜被放逐到龙穴的年轻女子，罗宾-怀特（Robin Wright）和安吉拉-贝塞特（Angela Bassett）也参与了这部影片的制作。
item.description:
Review: Millie Bobby Brown stars as a young woman banished to a dragon’s lair on her wedding night in Netflix's "Damsel," which also features Robin Wright and Angela Bassett https://t.co/HFaATlvxP6 https://t.co/HFaATlvxP6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 欧胡岛海岸的这一悠闲地带，是威基基和夏威夷岛上其他游客众多的角落的大众旅游市场的一剂良药。以下是游览计划。
item.description:
This laid-back strip of Oahu's coast offers an antidote to the mass-market tourism of Waikiki and other heavily visited corners of the Hawaiian island. Here's how to plan a visit. https://t.co/Bw6kJmgwjw https://t.co/Bw6kJmgwjw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 波音公司正在全面改革其支付员工奖金的方式，以强调质量和安全而非达到财务目标，这是继阿拉斯加航空公司一架航班的舱门塞爆炸事件后，波音公司为解决质量问题而采取的众多举措之一。
item.description:
Boeing is overhauling how it pays employee bonuses to emphasize quality and safety over meeting financial targets, one of many moves to address quality issues following the door-plug blowout on an Alaska Air flight https://t.co/JVsmyYQ5g2 https://t.co/JVsmyYQ5g2

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 一家位于得克萨斯州的公司可以将您亲人的火化遗体送入轨道、深空或月球。但是，将月球视为神圣之地的纳瓦霍部落正在进行反击。
item.description:
A Texas-based company can send your loved ones’ cremated remains into orbit, deep space or to the moon. But the Navajo Nation, who considers the moon sacred, is pushing back. https://t.co/nc7JLmFZba https://t.co/nc7JLmFZba

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统将在国情咨文中说明，在与唐纳德-特朗普的复赛之前，他已经促进了经济发展并保护了美国人的自由。
item.description:
In his State of the Union address, President Biden will make the case that he has bolstered the economy and protected Americans’ freedoms ahead of a rematch with Donald Trump https://t.co/wngqzWIGKN https://t.co/wngqzWIGKN

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：俄勒冈州选民决定在 2020 年容忍持有硬性毒品。立法者即将扭转这一错误，@KevinSabet 写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Oregon voters decided to tolerate possession of hard drugs in 2020. Lawmakers are about to reverse the error, writes @KevinSabet. https://t.co/aeGIVWnrPN https://t.co/aeGIVWnrPN

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：民主党让整个社会形成了太多的负面反馈回路。@Dan-Henninger写道：在我们的政治中，有一个人因此被贴上了标签：总统。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The Democrats have allowed too many negative feedback loops to develop across society. There is a pervasive sense of being hurt, and in our politics one person gets tagged for that: the president, writes @DanHenninger. https://t.co/HckrvT6oo6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 影评克里斯汀-斯图尔特（Kristen Stewart）与凯蒂-奥布莱恩（Katy O'Brian）、艾德-哈里斯（Ed Harris）主演的《爱在流血》（Love Lies Bleeding），讲述了一位健身房经理和一位有抱负的健美运动员在浪漫、犯罪和暴力中纠缠不清的故事。
item.description:
Review: Kristen Stewart stars alongside Katy O’Brian and Ed Harris "Love Lies Bleeding," about a gym manager and an aspiring bodybuilder who become entangled in a web of romance, crime and violence https://t.co/yMy0GeAea1 https://t.co/yMy0GeAea1

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 多年来，艺术品经销商布伦丹-杜根（Brendan Dugan）一直住在租来的公寓里，这些公寓就像他的画廊一样，简陋而乏味。后来，随着生意蒸蒸日上，一位室内设计师提高了他的设计水平。
item.description:
For years, art dealer Brendan Dugan lived in rented apartments that were a lot like his gallery: scrappy and seat-of-the-pants. Then as business took off, an interior designer raised his game. https://t.co/8ajQzu8UYp https://t.co/8ajQzu8UYp

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 小企业管理局已开始将多达 200 亿美元、余额在 10 万美元或以下的拖欠 Covid 灾难贷款移交财政部催收

item.title: 在一连串的法律攻击中，就连 NCAA 的领导者也放弃了一个世纪以来反对有偿比赛的立场，现在他们只是在运动员是否是雇员的问题上争论不休。
item.description:
Amid a barrage of legal attacks, even NCAA leaders have dropped a century-old stand against pay-for-play—now they’re just fighting over whether the athletes are employees https://t.co/FJ7ja36rLf https://t.co/FJ7ja36rLf

item.title: 气候数据初创公司 Gro Intelligence 的估值已降至 2,000 万至 2,500 万美元之间，在过去一周里，该公司在一笔交易中获得了投资者的救助，这可能会使其早期投资者血本无归。
item.description:

item.title: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）将其季度股息降至每股 1 美分，这是旨在增强人们对这家陷入困境的地区性银行信心的更广泛改革的一部分。
